SELECT p.post_seq, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_time, p.update_time, p.like_count, p.view_count, p.user_seq FROM post p INNER JOIN comment c ON p.post_seq = c.post_seq WHERE c.user_seq = #{userSeq} GROUP BY p.post_seq ORDER BY MAX(c.comment_time) DESC

SELECT p.post_seq, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_time, p.update_time, p.like_count, p.view_count, p.user_seq FROM post p INNER JOIN post_like_user plu ON p.post_seq = plu.post_seq WHERE plu.user_seq = #{userSeq} BY plu.like_time DESCORDER
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET post_title = #{postTitle}, post_content = #{postContent}, update_time = NOW() WHERE post_seq = #{postSeq}
UPDATE post SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE post_seq = #{postSeq}
UPDATE post SET like_count = like_count - 1 WHERE post_seq = #{postSeq} AND like_count > 0
